name: Green Salad With Asian Vinaigrette
keywords: dairy-free, rice vinegar, salad greens, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup peanut or other neutral oil
2 tablespoons rice vinegar or freshly squeezed lemon juice, or more to taste
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
6 cups torn assorted greens, like mesclun or any lettuce

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients except the greens in a blender and turn the machine on; a creamy emulsion will form within 30 seconds. Taste and adjust the seasoning, adding more vinegar if necessary until the balance tastes right to you.
Put the greens in a bowl, drizzle with the vinaigrette and toss. Taste and adjust the seasoning and serve immediately.
